metadata.title: CVE-2014-5020 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The File module in Drupal 7.x before 7.29 does not properly checkpermissions to view files, which allows remote authenticated users withcertain permissions to bypass intended restrictions and read files byattaching the file to content with a file field.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
